headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  O'HARA, REBECCA BROWNING

snippet: O'HARA--Rebecca Browning. O'HARA--Katharine Barbara (Kate), died on December 31, 2015. Rebecca was 99, of NYC. She is survived by her daughters, The Reverend Ellen O'Hara, Terry E. O'Hara, Liza O'Hara Mercereau, Alice O'Hara, and Hedwig O'Hara; by her son, Henry P. O'Hara; by her granddaughters, Julie Rosado and Emily Bader; and her great-grandchildren, Laila Sanchez and Jelani Sanchez. Katharine O'Hara, her daughter, was 71, of Staten Island. A memorial service will be held at Redden's Funeral Home at 325 West 14th Street, NYC on Monday, January 18, 2016 from 4pm to 6pm. The family requests that in lieu of sending flowers, donations be made to Amsterdam House (www.amsterdamnursing home.org) or Community Access (communityaccess.org) or to the beneficiary of donor's choice. 1/3
